title: 打工人的一天
synopsis: 一个普通打工人小明在工作日经历的搞笑日常，从早起挣扎到开会摸鱼，每个场景都有意想不到的反转，让观众产生强烈共鸣。

characterBank.name: 小明
characterBank.description: 25岁打工人，穿着普通白衬衫，戴着黑框眼镜，一脸疲惫但又努力装作精神的样子，短发，眼袋明显

characterBank.name: 王总
characterBank.description: 中年男性老板，穿着得体西装，表情严肃，手持文件夹

shots.sceneDescription: 早晨7点，闹钟响起。小明躺在床上，一只手伸出被子关闭闹钟，眼睛紧闭，脸上写满了不情愿。房间光线昏暗，被子凌乱。
shots.narration: 每天早上，我都在进行一场与闹钟的较量。
shots.cameraMovement: 从闹钟特写缓缓拉到小明脸部
shots.action: 小明痛苦地关闹钟，眼睛仍然紧闭
shots.imagePrompt: Young tired Chinese office worker in bed, reaching to turn off alarm clock, dark messy bedroom, morning light through curtains, realistic style, 9:16 portrait format

shots.sceneDescription: 小明睁开双眼，突然一个激灵坐起来，看向手机上的时间显示8:45，脸上露出惊恐表情。
shots.narration: 直到我赢得了今天的战斗！
shots.cameraMovement: 快速推进到小明惊恐的脸
shots.action: 小明猛然坐起，惊恐看向手机
shots.imagePrompt: Young Chinese man suddenly waking up in panic, looking at phone showing 8:45, shocked expression, messy hair, sitting up in bed, morning light, realistic style, 9:16 portrait format

shots.sceneDescription: 地铁车厢内，小明被挤在人群中间，只能看到一片脑袋。他努力抬起手看手表，表情痛苦。周围都是同样疲惫的上班族。
shots.narration: 上班路上，我练就了沙丁鱼的生存技能。
shots.cameraMovement: 俯拍拥挤地铁，聚焦小明
shots.action: 小明被挤得动弹不得，艰难呼吸
shots.imagePrompt: Extremely crowded subway car in China, young office worker squeezed among commuters, trying to check watch, exhausted faces everywhere, morning rush hour, realistic style, 9:16 portrait format

shots.sceneDescription: 公司会议室，王总站在投影幕前严肃地讲话。小明坐在后排，眼睛半闭，努力保持清醒但明显在打瞌睡。
shots.narration: 老板开会的声音，是最好的催眠曲。
shots.cameraMovement: 从老板切到小明昏昏欲睡的脸
shots.action: 小明头一点一点往下坠
shots.imagePrompt: Corporate meeting room, Chinese boss giving presentation, young employee in back row nearly falling asleep, eyes closing, head nodding, modern office setting, realistic style, 9:16 portrait format

shots.sceneDescription: 突然，王总叫了小明的名字。小明瞬间睁大眼睛，立刻坐直身体，假装认真在记笔记。旁边同事偷偷憋笑。
shots.narration: 但我永远能在0.1秒内假装自己很认真！
shots.cameraMovement: 快速切到小明震惊的脸
shots.action: 小明假装专注，拿起笔快速写字
shots.imagePrompt: Chinese office worker suddenly alert and pretending to take notes, wide eyes, sitting straight, colleague smiling next to him, meeting room background, realistic style, 9:16 portrait format

shots.sceneDescription: 王总走到小明面前，严肃地盯着他的笔记本。镜头转向笔记本，上面画满了表情包和涂鸦。小明尴尬地笑着。
shots.narration: 我的笔记？那是行为艺术！
shots.cameraMovement: 从王总的脸切到笔记本特写
shots.action: 笔记本上全是涂鸦，小明尴尬微笑
shots.imagePrompt: Close-up of notebook with doodles and emoji drawings, Chinese boss looking at it seriously, embarrassed young employee in background, office meeting room, realistic style, 9:16 portrait format

shots.sceneDescription: 下班时刻，小明坐在工位前对着电脑发呆，时钟显示5:59。他目不转睛盯着时钟，手已经放在关机按钮上。
shots.narration: 每天最认真的时刻，就是等下班。
shots.cameraMovement: 时钟特写和小明期待的眼神交替
shots.action: 小明紧盯时钟，随时准备关电脑
shots.imagePrompt: Chinese office worker staring intensely at clock showing 5:59, finger hovering over computer power button, anticipation expression, modern office cubicle, realistic style, 9:16 portrait format

shots.sceneDescription: 时钟显示6:00，小明刚准备起身，王总突然出现在他身后说：加个班。小明的笑容瞬间凝固。
shots.narration: 老板说加班就像说天气一样自然。
shots.cameraMovement: 从小明开心的脸到王总出现，再到小明表情凝固
shots.action: 小明的笑容凝固成社死表情
shots.imagePrompt: Chinese boss appearing behind young employee at 6:00 PM, employee's smile freezing, disappointed expression, clock showing 6:00 in background, office setting, realistic style, 9:16 portrait format

shots.sceneDescription: 晚上10点，小明终于下班，疲惫地走在空荡荡的街道上。路灯昏暗，只有他一个人的身影。他掏出手机看工资条。
shots.narration: 加班到十点，工资三千五。
shots.action: 小明疲惫看手机上的工资条
shots.imagePrompt: Tired Chinese office worker walking alone on empty street at night, looking at phone showing salary 3500 yuan, dim street lights, lonely atmosphere, realistic style, 9:16 portrait format

shots.sceneDescription: 小明突然振作起来，对着镜头比了一个大拇指，露出灿烂的笑容。背后是城市夜景。
shots.narration: 但没关系，明天还是充满希望的一天！（才怪）
shots.cameraMovement: 正面特写小明自嘲的笑
shots.action: 小明比大拇指，假装乐观微笑
shots.imagePrompt: Chinese office worker giving thumbs up with big smile, city night skyline behind, ironic happy expression, looking at camera, dramatic lighting, realistic style, 9:16 portrait format
